title: [NEW API]Translated Plugins' Home

txt_content:
本帖最后由 wangyibo1997 于 2015-1-25 15:13 编辑 
Some plugins

B.How to use ? 如何使用？
Drop it in the "plugins" folder,then restart your server.
C.Tips 提示
1.These plugins were downloaded from "http://pocketmine.net"2.I will translate some useful plugins in future.
